description:
Meet your daily dose of exercise, your commuter ride or your weekend play date. With great gearing, you can breathe easy on the hills and have fun on the flats. Its practical details include rack and fender mounts. From running errands to the morning commute, there's no wrong reason to ride a bike.

  • Smartform C3 alloy frame and chromoly fork, with relaxed geometry
  • Women's specific features: Women's saddle and step-through frame
  • 3x7 drive train pairs 48-38-28T chain rings with a 12-28T cassette
  • Shimano Tourney components, with an alloy Prowheel crank
  • Shimano V-brakes
  • KMC Z51 chain
  • Double-wall alloy rims
  • 700x35c tires
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for a year after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Quick 6 Remixte Bicycle - Women's

specs.value: Cannondale Ergo Fitness Dual Density Lock-on
